story.description: Find out the best payment method
story.narrative: In order to pay for order As a customer I want to choose the best payment method
story.name: menampilkan_metode_pembayaran_terbaik.story
story.scenarios:
Scenario:Recommend payment method if balance enough Given rhio has balance 1000 When amount is 500 Then system should recommend gopay payment method
Scenario:Recommend payment method if balance not enough Given adjie has balance 10000 When amount is 15000000 Then system should recommend cash payment method
